content: Oct 21 Hard disk drive maker Western Digital Corp said it would buy memory chip maker SanDisk Corp  in a deal valued at about $19 billion  the latest in a wave of consolidation in the chip-making industry.
name: Western Digital Corporation
title: Western Digital to buy SanDisk in $19 bln deal

content: Hard disk drive maker Western Digital Corp is in advanced talks to acquire memory chipmaker SanDisk Corp  people familiar with the matter said on Monday  as a frenzy of dealmaking in the semiconductor sector continued.
name: Western Digital Corporation

content: Hard-disk drive maker Western Digital Corp  agreed to buy SanDisk Corp  in a $19 billion deal that will increase its ability to make flash memory storage chips used in smartphones and tablets. | Video

content: WASHINGTON  Oct 6 The Pentagon's chief arms buyer on Tuesday issued a reminder that the U.S. Defense Department remains watchful on the security of electronic components used in weapons  when asked about a $3.78 billion Chinese plan to invest in U.S. data storage company Western Digital Corp.
name: Western Digital Corporation
title: Pentagon says remains vigilant on security of electronics supply chain

content: SINGAPORE/TAIPEI  Oct 1 A billion-dollar Chinese plan to invest in Western Digital Corp is designed to plug the U.S. data storage firm into a network of influential China tech players carefully constructed  by Tsinghua University  the alma mater of President Xi Jinping.
name: Western Digital Corporation
title: Tsinghua deal to connect Western Digital to powerful China tech set

content: China's state-backed Tsinghua Holdings Co Ltd [TSHUAA.UL] plans to buy a 15 percent stake in U.S. data storage company Western Digital Corp  a deal that could draw regulatory scrutiny amid increased national security concerns.
name: Western Digital Corporation
title: China's Tsinghua to buy Western Digital stake in U.S. tech push

content: ABU DHABI/SEOUL May 13 State-run Abu Dhabi National Oil Company (ADNOC) has signed a 40-year deal with GS Energy  selling the South Korean firm a 3 percent stake in an onshore oil concession to develop the United Arab Emirates' (UAE) biggest oilfields.

content: SAN FRANCISCO  Feb 16 The U.S. National Security Agency has figured out how to hide spying software deep within hard drives made by Western Digital  Seagate  Toshiba and other top manufacturers  giving the agency the means to eavesdrop on the majority of the world's computers  according to cyber researchers and former operatives.
name: Western Digital Corporation
title: UPDATE 3-Russian researchers expose breakthrough U.S. spying program

content: Western Digital Corp  the world's No. 1 hard-disk drive maker  reported second-quarter results slightly ahead of Wall Street expectations on strong demand for its solid-state drives from enterprise customers.
name: Western Digital Corporation
title: Western Digital's second-quarter results beat Street on strong enterprise growth

content: Jan 27 Western Digital Corp  the world's No. 1 hard-disk drive maker  reported second-quarter results slightly ahead of Wall Street expectations on strong demand for its solid-state drives from enterprise customers.

title: Western Digital's 2nd-qtr results beat Street on strong enterprise growth
